metadata.name: Complete Setup for HTTP+P2P
metadata.description:
Fully configured setup for non-debrid users, preconfigured with both P2P and HTTP streaming addons, and formatter, based on Tamtaro's "Complete SEL Setup for P2P" Template [here](https://github.com/Tam-Taro/SEL-Filtering-and-Sorting/blob/main/AIOStreams%20Templates/Tamtaro-complete-setup-P2P-template.json).\n\n
* Designed to prioritize HTTP results for fast and highest quality results with minimal clutter. Fallback to P2P addons sorted by highest number of seeders first.
metadata.author: allecsc

excludedStreamExpressions: /*Seeders Filter (Uncached)*/ count(type(streams,'debrid','usenet')) > 0?  ( count(seeders(type(uncached(streams),'debrid'), 5)) < 5 ? [] :  merge(count(regexMatched(streams)) > 0 ? seeders(merge(regexMatched(negate(uncached(type(streams,'usenet')), uncached(streams)),'','Bad'), type(streams,'p2p')),0,5) : seeders(merge(negate(uncached(type(streams,'usenet')), uncached(streams)), type(streams,'p2p')),0,5) ) ): []

/*Seeders Filter (P2P)*/	 count(seeders(type(streams,'p2p'), 5)) < 5 ? [] :  count(seeders(type(streams,'p2p'), 50)) > 20? seeders(type(streams,'p2p'), 0,50) : count(seeders(type(streams,'p2p'),25)) > 20? seeders(type(streams,'p2p'), 0,25) : count(seeders(type(streams,'p2p'), 10)) > 20? seeders(type(streams,'p2p'),0,10) : count(seeders(type(streams,'p2p'), 1)) > 20? seeders(type(streams,'p2p'), 0,1) : []

/*Bad NZB Filter*/ merge(releaseGroup(type(streams,'usenet', 'stremio-usenet'),'sample'), resolution(size(type(streams, 'usenet','stremio-usenet'), 0, queryType == 'movie' ? '400MB':'200MB'), '2160p', '1440p'), size(type(streams, 'usenet','stremio-usenet'), 0, queryType == 'movie' ? '200MB':'100MB'),  message(type(streams,'usenet', 'stremio-usenet'),'includes','ðŸš«'))

/*Final Filter (Low Quality & Resolution)*/ merge(count(quality(negate(merge(library(streams), seadex(streams)),merge(cached(streams),type(streams,'p2p','http'))),'Bluray REMUX','Bluray','WEB-DL','WEBRip')) >12? quality(negate(merge(library(streams), seadex(streams)),streams),'HDRip','HC HD-Rip','DVDRip','HDTV','CAM','TS','TC','SCR'):  count(quality(negate(merge(library(streams), seadex(streams)),merge(cached(streams),type(streams,'p2p','http'))),'Bluray REMUX','Bluray','WEB-DL','WEBRip','HDRip','HC HD-Rip','DVDRip','HDTV')) >12? negate(merge(library(streams), seadex(streams)), merge(slice(type(uncached(streams),'debrid'), 6), slice(resolution(merge(type(streams, 'usenet','http','p2p'), type(cached(streams), 'debrid')),'576p','480p','360p','240p','144p','Unknown'), -1))):[] )
